    • Method Detail

      • executeAction

        public void executeAction()
        Evaluation: Check if I'm dead first. If weapon in cell call acquireWeapon method. If no weapon call search method. Acquire Weapon: Pickup weapon and change to Has Weapon state. Dead: Move to Dead state Search: Turn random direction and move to new Cell.
        Specified by:
        executeAction in class ActionState
